title: Strange to notice that Pixel 2 battery price is significantly higher than any any other model.
content:
The battery started to degrade on my Pixel 2 and was looking for a replacement. It was really strange to see that that new Battery price of the Pixel 2 is significantly higher when compared to the XL models of for that matter the latest models.

Not sure what's going on. It would be great if the team can rework on the pricing.

Ref Link: https://googlepixel-support.b2x.com/part-price-list/?devicename=Pixel
